title: LockettePro箱子锁插件可以用漏斗偷东西
author: QAQQAQ123
txt_content:
以下是配置文件，
anguage-file-name: lang.yml
enable-quick-protect: true
enable-uuid-support: false
block-interfere-placement: true
block-item-transfer-in: true
block-item-transfer-out: true
block-hopper-minecart: remove
cache-time-seconds: 0
private-signs:
- '[Private]'
- '[private]'
additional-signs:
- '[More Users]'
- '[more Users]'
everyone-signs:
- '[Everyone]'
- '[everyone]'
timer-signs:
- '[Timer:@]'
- '[timer:@]'
lockables:
- CHEST
- TRAPPED_CHEST
- FURNACE
- BURNING_FURNACE
- HOPPER
- BREWING_STAND
- DIAMOND_BLOCK
- WOODEN_DOOR
- SPRUCE_DOOR
- BIRCH_DOOR
- JUNGLE_DOOR
- ACACIA_DOOR
- DARK_OAK_DOOR
- IRON_DOOR_BLOCK
- IRON_CHEST
- IRONCHEST_IRON_CHEST
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_ORANGE
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_MAGENTA
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_LIGHT_BLUE
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_YRLLOW
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_LIME
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_PINK
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_GRAY
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_SILVER
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_CYAN
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_PURPLE
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_BLUE
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_BROWN
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_GREEN
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_RED
- IRON_SHULIKER_BOX_BLACK
protection-exempt:
- nothing
lock-expire: false
lock-expire-days: 999.9
lock-default-create-time-unix: -1
lock-expire-string: '&3[Expired]'

replies.author: 我爱魁拔
replies.txt_content: 把block-item-transfer-out: true 改成block-item-transfer-out: false 试试

replies.author: QAQQAQ123
replies.txt_content:
我爱魁拔 发表于 2020-3-19 16:28
把block-item-transfer-out: true 改成block-item-transfer-out: false 试试
我改了试了下还是不行

replies.author: 小怪兽QVQ
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 撒个
replies.txt_content: 用最新版的LockttePro插件，什么都不用配置（https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-567962-1-1.html），刚刚测试了，最新版的上锁的箱子下面别人放不了漏斗。虽然可以放铁轨，但是把漏斗矿车推到箱子下面之后漏斗矿车就会消失。总而言之，已经偷不了了

replies.author: QAQQAQ123
replies.txt_content:
小言u 发表于 2020-3-19 21:36
block-hopper-minecart: remove将“remove”改为“true”就行了
我试下看看可以不
